entry.dcterms:title: Notions of the Nation and Politics Among Senior Secondary School Students in Hungary1996
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F15: Notions of the Nation and Politics Among Senior Secondary School Students in Hungary1996. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Szabó, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:description: the survey examined the organization of informational, value and attitude elements of citizenship culture among high school students in their last year
entry.dcterms:subject: education, school
minorities
social stratification and groupings
political institutions, public administration
cultural and national identity
person
survey data
cross-section

A 2600-person random probability national representative sample. Educational institutions were the units of selection, which were representative by regional location and number of students. Response rate: 96%.
self-administered questionnaire
A
